id1.text: Well, here we are... I just got off a case. I'm hoping you might be able to help lighten my mood.

id2.text: Yeah, thanks... It was a grisly one. Like nothing I've seen before, in all my years. If you're lucky, you'll never run into something like that.

id3.text: This is no joking matter... It was a grisly one. Like nothing I've seen before, in all my years. If you're lucky, you'll never run into something like that.

id4.text: It was a grisly one. Like nothing I've seen before, in all my years. If you're lucky, you'll never run into something like that.

id5.text: I appreciate it. But what I'll appreciate more: A stiff drink. And of course, the company helps.

id6.text: Whatever. I'd really appreciate a stiff drink. And maybe the company could help my mood, too.

id7.text: Whatever. I'd really appreciate a stiff drink. And maybe the company could help my mood, too.

id8.text: I'd really appreciate a stiff drink. And of course, the company helps.

id9.text: Definitely. You've got that air of mystery around you too, I can tell these things... But that shadow can be attractive, you know.

id10.text: You've got an air of mystery around you too. I can tell these things. But that shadow could be attractive, you know.

id11.text: You've got that air of mystery around you too, I can tell these things... But that shadow can be attractive, you know.

id12.text: You have that gleam in your eye. Something behind the pretty face. If I weren't a private eye, I'd say you were seeing things I can't. Maybe you are. Ghosts.

id13.text: ...You have a gleam in your eye. Something behind that mug. If I weren't a private eye, I'd say you were seeing things I can't. Maybe you are. Ghosts.

id14.text: ...You have a gleam in your eye. Something behind that smug mug. If I weren't a private eye, I'd say you were seeing things I can't. Maybe you are. Ghosts.

id15.text: You have that gleam in your eye. If I weren't a private eye, I'd say you were seeing things I can't. Maybe you are. Ghosts.

id16.text: Ha, exactly. Spooky stories and pretty strangers, to take our attention off the real horrors. So... Thanks for that.

id17.text: Yeah, sure... We need spooky stories and pretty strangers, to take our attention off the real horrors. I'd thank you for that.

id18.text: Spooky stories and pretty strangers, to take our attention off the real horrors. Thanks for that.
